manifest.name: @sentry/utils
manifest.description: Utilities for all Sentry JavaScript SDKs
manifest.readme: # Sentry JavaScript SDK Utilities [![npm version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@sentry/utils.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@sentry/utils) [![npm dm](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/@sentry/utils.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@sentry/utils) [![npm dt](https://img.shields.io/npm/dt/@sentry/utils.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@sentry/utils) [![typedoc](https://img.shields.io/badge/docs-typedoc-blue.svg)](http://getsentry.github.io/sentry-javascript/) ## Links - [Official SDK Docs](https://docs.sentry.io/quickstart/) - [TypeDoc](http://getsentry.github.io/sentry-javascript/) ## General Common utilities used by the Sentry JavaScript SDKs. **Warning, only submodule imports are allowed here.** Also note, this function shouldn't be used externally, we will break them from time to time. This package is not part of our public API contract, we use them only internally.
